channel.title: [317] How do I

item.title: [317] How do I
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I was looking through my client.java in my server source and I came across this code that seems to be some sort of welcome interface. I was wondering if it would be possible to make this work when I log in…

[code] public void openWelcomeScreen(int recoveryChange, boolean memberWarning,
int messages, int lastLoginIP, int lastLogin) {
outStream.createFrame(176);
// days since last recovery change 200 for not yet set 201 for members
// server,
// otherwise, how many days ago recoveries have been changed.
outStream.writeByteC(recoveryChange);
outStream.writeWordA(messages); // # of unread messages
outStream.writeByte(memberWarning ? 1 : 0); // 1 for member on
// non-members world warning
outStream.writeDWord_v2(lastLoginIP); // ip of last login
outStream.writeWord(lastLogin); // days
}

[/code]

There might be more things related to this in other files in the source but I was wondering if I could make this work…

Read full topic
